result.markdown:
# Plotting spatial data





::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(terra)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyterra)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
file <- here::here("data", "avhrr-only-v2.20160503.nc")
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
sst_layer <- rast(file, subds = "sst") |>
  rotate()

sst_layer
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
class       : SpatRaster 
dimensions  : 720, 1440, 1  (nrow, ncol, nlyr)
resolution  : 0.25, 0.25  (x, y)
extent      : -180, 180, -90, 90  (xmin, xmax, ymin, ymax)
coord. ref. : lon/lat WGS 84 (CRS84) (OGC:CRS84) 
source(s)   : memory
varname     : sst (Daily sea surface temperature) 
name        : sst_zlev=0 
min value   :      -1.80 
max value   :      32.69 
unit        :  degrees C 
time (days) : 2016-05-03 
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
plot(sst_layer)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](01_basics_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-5-1.png)
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot() +
  geom_spatraster(data = sst_layer) +
  scale_fill_viridis_c(na.value = "transparent") +
  labs(fill = "Sea Surface\nTemperature (Â°C)") +
  coord_sf(crs = "+proj=robin")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](01_basics_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-6-1.png)
:::
:::
